subject: Fashion
title: Travis Scott's Fashion Empire
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Travis Scott's Fashion Empire.

hook.text: Travis Scott's Nike collabs resell for ten times retail. Every. Single. Time.

buildup.text: Scott built a brand around Cactus Jackâ€”merch, Nike deals, and McDonald's collabs.

discovery.text: His strategy treats every product as a limited cultural event, not just merch.

twist.text: He proved musicians can be fashion moguls without designing a single stitch.

climax.text: The line between music merchandise and fashion collection has vanished.

punchline.text: He doesn't sell clothes. He sells moments.

quiz.question: What makes Travis Scott's fashion strategy unique?
options: Every product launch is treated as a limited cultural event
He only sells in physical stores
